column3:
An infantry soldier wielding a rapid-fire crossbow.

Originated from the City of Light, these lightning knights serve as the stewards of innovation.

Element: Lightning
column5:
Hold left click to fire lightning bolts. Requires ammo which reloads overtime.

Damage: %d
column7: Each level increases max ammo count by %d.
column9:
Every 3rd shot shoots an enhanced lightning bolts, with %d damage.

Each upgrade increases scaling of enhanced bolt by %d%.
column11:
Every shot now fires 2 bullets, ammo is unaffected.

Also works with Burst shot.
column13:
Hold down right click until you reach a charge tier (50, 100, etc.) then let go to fire a Grand Bolt.

Charge Type: Burst
Damage: %d
Charge rate: %d
column15:
Adds a 2nd charge tier with increased projectile size and piercing.

Tier 1 Scaling: %d
Tier 2 Scaling: %d
column17:
Bonus Effect: Charged shots fire a volley of homing missiles. 

Higher charge tiers fire more missiles.

Damage: 5 (does not scale)
column19: Each level increases charge rate by %d.
